page.title: 01IMMIGRATION TO MONKLANDS
page.content: Much of the area at the SE of the study area is part of Monklands District. Many people from all over the world have their roots in the Monklands, whereas only 4% of Monklanders have their roots outside Scotland. Industrial growth brought many emigrants from Ireland in the last century, creating a population explosion. Monklands has the largest Roman Catholic community of any Scottish district, accounting for nearly 56% of the Coatbridge people. In recent yaers however the decline of our traditional mining and ironworking industries has lead to mass unemployment,forcing people to move in search of work and a better life. A recent survey carried out in the 3rd year of Coatbridge High School
